title: Client Freeze
body: My client freezes in champ select too often making me dodge. Just got put into a 30 minute dodge timer because this happened to me twice yesterday. Very frustrating. A fix?

replies.body: There's not a lot I can do about LPQ's here on the boards, since it will only kick in after multiple instances of being AFK, but I might have a way of stopping those freezes. Some players have noticed that the new animations in the client are causing some issues with disconnections in champ select. I'd like to have you try going into the client options, and turning on low-spec mode. Most often, this is able to help stop champ select interruptions, but hit me back up and let me know if it helps!
